## Everything you need to start a website

We take the best parts of state-of-the-art tools and add our own innovations.

::: {layout-ncol=3}

{{< bi briefcase >}} **Bring Your Own Framework**  Build your site using React, Svelte, Vue, Preact, web components, or just plain ol' HTML + JavaScript.

{{< bi filetype-html >}} **100% Static HTML, No JS** CloudCore Solutions renders your entire page to static HTML, removing all JavaScript from your final build by default.

{{< bi database >}} **On-Demand Components** Need some JS? We can automatically hydrate interactive components when they become visible on the page.

{{< bi robot >}} **Broad Integration** We support TypeScript, Scoped CSS, CSS Modules, Sass, Tailwind, Markdown, MDX, and any other npm packages.

{{< bi search >}} **SEO Enabled** Automatic sitemaps, RSS feeds, pagination and collections take the pain out of SEO and syndication. It just works!

{{< bi people >}} **Community** We use open source projects powered by hundreds of contributors making thousands of individual contributions.
:::
